title: Worst product
body:
I recently purchased this face cream, and unfortunately, my experience has been far from satisfactory. Despite conducting a patch test as recommended, this product proved to be a nightmare for my skin, particularly around the delicate eye area.

This face cream is undeniably harsh, causing severe irritation and itching on my face. Within minutes of application, my eyes were stinging, tearing up, and the skin around them became red and inflamed. I had hoped for a soothing and hydrating effect, but instead, I experienced discomfort that persisted throughout the day.

Adding to the disappointment was the lackluster customer support service team. I reached out to them to express my concerns and seek guidance on whether this reaction was normal or if there was a potential issue with the product. Sadly, their response was anything but helpful. The representative I spoke with seemed disinterested and offered no solutions or alternatives. It felt as though they were more interested in brushing off my concerns rather than addressing them.

In conclusion, I cannot recommend this face cream based on my personal experience. The intense irritation and lack of support from the customer service team have left me dissatisfied and frustrated. I would caution anyone considering this product to think twice.

title: Do not use any hair product without dermat consultation
body:
I started using the hair serum it's been a few days and my scalp has an itchy burning sensation and a lot of pain. I waited a few days for the pain to relieve and again started using the product. My scalp hurts even more now. I visited dermat nearby, she told me this could be the side effect of the product. She asked me to stop using the product immediately and gave me some over-the-counter medication. 
I request anyone reading my review, if you have hair problems please visit the doctor. Spend reasonable money in consultation with the doctor rather than trying to save money on the products that can lead you to spend even more.

title: Wasn't expecting a BB cream
body: When I bought the cream, only it having a 50+ spf and mosturising and nourishing qualities were in my mind. I had no idea that it will be like a BB cream that is a very light coverage foundation for my face and this is something I didn't like. Actually, when we buy a foundation, we have to make sure we purchase the shade nearest to our skin tone, so, it doesn't look odd on our face. And exactly this is what happened, I have medium to dark skintone and the shade of the cream is very light for me, when I apply it, it leaves a greyish cast on my face and I really don't like it. I would request you to either make it available in different shades or just remove the foundation qualities from the cream or atleast mention it somewhere in bold letters, so, when somebody is buying it they know exactly in what they are investing. Rest the cream is fine. Thank you.
I have just used it for 14 days but not improvement I have seen... let's used it for 1 months to see the results

title: Hair Growth Serum
body: BOGO offers have been a boon for me, when it comes to Pilgrim Hair Growth Serum. Economical & 100% effective. I don't have issue of hairfall but poor hair growth. I have fine, thin 3B 3C curly hairs & the volume has been reducing, due to thinning of hairs. So kuch now that scalp shows through when I style & clump them. It's been over 3 months I've been using this Serum & I can openly vouch about the effectiveness of this product. 2 dropper full with massage every night 6days/week & my partner has been complimenting on the density at the scalp level. Thr hair length has definitely grown, noticeable as I had a trim in Feb. Yes, my diet is a clean one, I have Aliv every morning & nope, I don't exercise much. But I believe, the serum has definitely added a lot of value to the whole clean living, for my scalp health. My advise to everyone: Go for it, Be Consistent, Be patient, Results will follow. â¤

title: Average
body:
I don't think it really did much for me. I'm a retinol newbie so got a few breakouts which I had gotten to know is normal for beginners, apart from that I didn't see any negative or positive effects. Have been using it since 1.5 months now, started with 2 times a week and gradually increased to alternate days or sometimes even days in a row now. Will wait for the entire bottle to be over before deciding if it worked for me or if I'll repurchase it again. Other than that:
Product consistency - Neither runny nor too thick, perfect for a serum, gets quickly absorbed
Fragrance - Is present but it's mild and nice
Feel on application - Feels smooth but slightly sticky
Packaging & shipping -  In a dark, glass dropper bottle, all good in that aspect.

title: Holy grail for my scalp!
body:
As someone with a sensitive scalp which also  happens to be more on the oily side I've always struggled with dandruff and build-up. I wasn't really sure about adding a scalp exfoliator to my routine but I am just so glad that I did it. I'm on my second bottle already and it's been helping me so much. My dandruff has reduced a lot and build up is gone. 
Even though the scrub is applied on scalp, sometimes my hair feel a little stripped off of their natural oils afterwards. So, for me adding a hair mask makes them feel very nourished and soft. The Argon oil hair mask from Pilgrim or Plum's Olives & Macadamia hair mask work the best for me. :)

title: False promises, Flawed products: Lip care combo disaster
body:
My experience with the pilgrims' Valentine's Day offer was a complete and utter disappointment.
This is a review of the Pilgrims lip care combo I recently purchased, The offer was buy 1 get 1 free, along with a free jute bag.

1. MISSING JUTE BAG: They advertised a free jute bag, but the jute bag mysteriously vanished from my order. this is indicative of a brand that doesn't deliver on its promises. 

2. The USELESS Products: I specifically purchase the lip care combo because of my dry lips. However, these products were a complete and utter WASTE of money. Not only did they FAIL to provide any hydration or relief, but my lips became WORST. They were drier and flakier than ever before.

3. Apparently this wasn't an isolated incident: My colleague, who also fell for the Valentine's Day offer, Experienced the same bad experience. Her moisturizer seemed to mysteriously vanish even without application.

This is beyond a simple product malfunction. Don't be FOOLED by pilgrims' empty promises. Save your money and lips - Look elsewhere

title: Bad Product, please don't buy
body:
I had purchased a sampler of this product from Fabpiks. Horrible idea - the percentage of retinol isn't shared, this nearly gave me burns on my face and such horrible itchiness. In the name of "Jeju Island", these folks are pitching "Korean skincare" brands, when in reality this is produced in J&K or HP. I would like to know if they have a single chemist or doctor on their team who knows what they're doing or if it's a bunch of unqualified folks who decided to mix some chemicals and sell it. 

Also for all skin types as their website states? A BIG NO. Please - folks with sensitive skin, reconsider.

title: Effective Product. Affordable price.
body: writing this review after 3 months of continuous usage of this product. It's basic, to be honest. It's a simple formulation yet one of my favorite combo of the two most effective ingredients for oily/combo acne-prone skin. In my experience this is a good serum if not the best, it helps in minimizing open pores, reducing blackheads (mind the term reduce), and balances oil without over-drying. blackhead reduction takes time like 2-3 weeks depending on how your skin reacts to the product. for me, my blackheads have quite shrunk and reduced but not completely removed. Oil control and pore minimizing starts from week 1. If you have hypersensitive skin like me start with 1-2 times a week as it contains 2% BHA. For me, it irritates my skin slightly for a few seconds after application then settles down completely which is normal I guess so don't forget to do a patch test if u have hyper sensitive or barrier-compromised skin. overall since good product. try grabbing it on sale!!

title: An honest review
body:
I have been using it past  20 days now and this is my honest review based on these factors - age 27+ , gender - female, problem - little pigmentation on cheek bones, dry cheeks and oily T Zone (during winter), location -kolkata ( reason of giving location - the one reading it can compare the climate of kolkata with their area climate as I feel climate also plays a vital role in skin care products) 
Review time- 
The product is easy to blend , it glides smoothly and get's easily absorbed. I like the mild fragrance it has , gives moisturization upto 4-5 hours post that if u r at home , have to reapply it if u want to. Small quantity goes a log way. 

Taking about glow ,till now no such glow i can evidence on my skin , may be i have to give it more time. 

Fyi- I am using it's serum as well to enhance the effect .
Squalane Glow Moisturizer

title: Sceptical
body:
I checked the ingredients for comedogenicity. I found out three ingredients in it were comedogenic. I'll name them below:
1) hydrogenated castor oil 
2) glycine soja (soybean) seed extract 
3) aluminium starch octenylsuccinate 
If this product claims to be for oily acne prone skin then it shouldn't have comedogenic ingredients. As comedogenic ingredients in the long run contributes to acne. I just hope the company will highlight this issue and solve it effectively.

title: Worst don't not dare to buy
body:
I recently purchased your hair serum from the Pilgrim website, and unfortunately, I must express my disappointment with the product. Despite my hopes for a high-quality serum, the reality fell far short of my expectations.

The serum I received did not meet the promised standards of effectiveness and quality. After several uses, I noticed no improvement in my hair condition. Instead, the serum left my hair feeling greasy and weighed down, with no visible benefits to its texture or appearance.

As a loyal customer, I had hoped for a product that would deliver on its claims and provide noticeable results. However, the experience has left me feeling let down and dissatisfied with my purchase.

I believe it's important to provide honest feedback to ensure the improvement of products and customer satisfaction. I hope that this feedback will be taken into consideration to enhance the quality of your hair care offerings in the future.

title: A big Noooo...!!!
body:
Well if you'll ask me for an honest review, then I'll say when it comes to Fragrances not all beauty products companies are good in that, except MCaffine, WoW and Moody. They're the top notch and the game changer must say, I'm saying it with confidence because I'm using the perfumes daily of all the 3 brands mention below and trust me they're simply amazing, wow and long lasting. Now let's talk about Pilgrim, being an avid perfume collector when I came through pilgrims ad on insta I was just stunned because being a top most brands in skincare now they're entering in fragrance industry that too they're giving 100ml bottle perfume with B1G1 offer in just 599 Rs... And that's where I made a big mistake, though I read their top middle and base notes along with reviews I found Zen and Alpha interesting and just thought to give it a try , was so excited till I received my order day before yesterday it came I took along Zen with me on my shooting sets I sprayed it on me and suddenly that strong smells went to my nose and through nose in head it was a terrible shot, and the first Uncompliment feedback I got from my makeup man, "Sir yes konsa perfume hai? " I thought he'll compliment me for that, but instead of that he said, "Sir after your performance on screen and your positive aura you're also well known for the way you smell and the perfumes your wear are simply smells like exotic and rich, but ye wala bohot local aur sasta smell kar raha hai please don't wear it." So this was the first feedback and after that the co actors on my set were just gossiping, "god someone's have wear such a terrible strong perfume" And they recognize i was the culprit. Same thing same experience I got today I thought chalo yaar alpha thik hoga but nahi, woh bhi horrible hi nikla. 
So today I called one of their customer care executive for the same, and he said sir yes first time hua hai I personally use Zen aisa ho nahi sakta and all that marketing words. Well I will suggest you people to please try to research on "Moody's aquatic breeze" The way it smells like Davidoffs cool water, if you want to sell Zen as in aquatic range, the notes if Moody's aquatic breeze is top notch elegant and smells rich classy, same thing if you want to sell alpha and Greek god then do research on Mcaffines Bourbon Dark Fantasy and Addicted.... These are the highly recommended fragrances if wanna smell rich elegant and classy. That's it don't want to demoralize you people again I'm saying you're the best in skincare products but please please do rethink research and remade it your perfumes note if you also want perfume buyers in your list. And if you're just focusing local clientile list who just go to store and say, "bhaiyya jara achhi khushbuwala scent dena" then just keep it as it is jyada load leneki bhi jaroorat nahi. 
Your wellwisher.

title: I received oxidised serum twice
body: For the past 10 months, I've been using the Alpha Arbutin & Vitamin C Brightening Serum, however, in March 2024, the serum I received was oxidised noticeable by its golden or yellowish colour instead of the usual transparent one. upon contacting customer care, I was informed that due to the predominance of natural ingredients slight colour changes may occur. I found this explanation unsatisfactory, especially when the serum didn't work as it used to work on my skin. Hoping for better results I ordered another bottle of the same serum in April 2024, only to receive another bottle of the same oxidised product with the same response from customer care. My experience with Pilgrim has left me truly disappointed. I advise caution before spending money on their products. I am attaching a pic for reference.

title: No effect even after using 2 bottles.
body: Initially as instructed, left it on skin for just 10 minutes. No effect. Later tried it by leaving it for 20 minutes. No effect. Finally left for even 30 minutes. All same tanned skin even after 2 bottles. No peeling, no lightening, no softening, nothing...I want to remove the tan on all these areas. No use of applying 2 full bottles. Not even it lightens the tan. Your customer service was good. I appreciated it many times through mail. Asked for prior delivery, everything was arranged as requested. title: I can say it's a good sunscreen.
body: Before I share my thoughts on the Squalane Ultra Matte Sunscreen, I want to mention that I've never used a sunscreen quite like this before. This is my first time incorporating a sunscreen into my skincare routine. Initially, I experienced some itching after applying the sunscreen, especially when I used it after my Vitamin-C serum. However, I adjusted my skincare routine by applying the sunscreen after moisturizing, and while I still experienced some mild itching, it was much more manageable compared to before. Overall, I find this product to be effective, and I haven't encountered any other drawbacks so far.

title: Worst products, it has tons of alcohol and irritate the skin
body:
Just look at the ingredients they have used. Don't cheap out and go for something standard brands like The Minimalist etc.

- Alcohol: Can be drying and irritating, particularly those with sensitive or dry skin conditions.

- **Sodium Benzoate and Potassium Sorbate:** These are commonly used preservatives in cosmetics and skincare products. studies suggest that when mixed with ascorbic acid (Vitamin C), sodium benzoate can form benzene, a known carcinogen. 
- Phenoxyethanol: Used as a preservative in cosmetic products, phenoxyethanol is generally considered safe within certain concentrations (up to 1% in the EU and US). However, it can cause allergic reactions or irritation for sensitive skin

- Perfume (Fragrance): Fragrances are a common cause of allergic reactions and skin sensitivities. The term "perfume" or "fragrance" can represent an undisclosed mixture of various scent chemicals and ingredients used to create the fragrance. Individuals with sensitive skin or allergies may prefer to avoid products with added fragrances. 

- Ethylhexylglycerin: Often used as a skin conditioning agent and preservative, ethylhexylglycerin is generally considered safe. However, like with any ingredient, there is potential for skin irritation or allergic reactions in sensitive individuals.

title: Best sunscreen? Nah, Probably the worst one.
body:
(Hoping this won't be deleted and people see this) I tried this day cream and unfortunately, I cannot recommend it based on my experience. 
Skin Type - Dry, no acne concerns. Skin Tone - Kay Beauty 130Y 

As soon as I opened the box I noticed the smell, the fragrance was overwhelming and gave me a headache, which makes it difficult for me to wear it for an extended period. Additionally, no matter how much of the cream I used, it simply would not blend into my skin, leaving me with uneven coverage// looking like a ghost.

To make matters worse, the cream stung my skin and left it red, which was both uncomfortable and unsightly. Based on my experience, I would not recommend this product to any skin type especially sensitive, or acne-prone skin, as it is likely to make these issues worse.

Furthermore, as it has SPF 50, it is essential that it provides adequate sun protection, but unfortunately, this product did not live up to this expectation. Despite trying to apply the cream in the recommended quantity, it simply would not blend into my skin, leaving me unsure of whether I was getting the necessary sun protection. As per the directions, it says "Apply small amount of cream and dab it gently all over face and neck. Massage in upward outward motion." Firstly, correct me if I'm wrong but how is small amount of cream going to provide proper sun protection?

Lastly, the product pills on the face. Yes, even if you use a "small amount" of product it pills. This was not only unattractive but also made it impossible for me to apply makeup over the top.

Overall, I would not recommend this cream to anyone. Unfortunately, it is a total waste of money.

title: After a month of use
body: This was my first retinol based night cream. I like it's consistency for some reason. In my night ritual, i combined it with pilgrim vitamin c serum. These two combination worked well and the result is i have a hydrated skin at night without the fear of my skin becoming oily in the morning. I think I'm going for a repeat! It' quite fits in the budget too. But yeah i didn't get a spatula with it. I don't know the reason. i usually avoid using perfumed product on my skin. But this night cream hasn't yet shown any concern to my skin to not continue using it. I kindof like the smell...feels personal. Don't forget to use a sunblock in the morning :)  Goodluck!

title: A Game-Changer for Radiant Skin: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
body: First and foremost, the results are simply remarkable. After just a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall tone and texture of my skin. Moreover, I have found the serum to be exceptionally gentle and suitable for sensitive skin types. I have experienced no irritation or redness, which can sometimes occur with Vitamin C products. This makes it an excellent choice for those with delicate skin who still want to enjoy the benefits of Vitamin C. Its remarkable ability to brighten, even out skin tone, and provide long-term anti-aging benefits make it an indispensable addition to any skincare regimen. I wholeheartedly recommend this serum to anyone seeking a radiant complexion and a boost of confidence.

title: Absolutely love this gel!
body: I've used many aloe vera gels in the past, but none of them felt as nice as this one! The texture is so smooth, it gets absorbed into your skin in seconds and leaves it feeling so soft and plump. It doesn't peel like other aloe gels and gives a cooling effect on the skin. It's got no fragrance, or any ingredients that could irritate your skin. I use it as a moisturizer and makeup primer. It has helped heal acne on my combination skin, so props for that. Also, the quantity is just amazing for the price. It's the favourite part of my skincare routine and I can see myself using this product for a long time!

title: Not for sensitive skin
body:
Got hives, rashes and acne breakouts just after the first use. While the reaction was understandable due to my sensitive skin or a defective batch of the product, what was disheartening was the response from the company. They kept blaming my facewash (which i have been using for more than 6 months without any issues) rather than taking responsibility for it. And the worst part was they never refunded for my other unused product which i had ordered as a combo in their sale.
Didn't suit my skin. But very disappointed by their response and the way they handled it. Definitley not ordering from them ever again.
Their products might suit you, but if they don't, please keep in mind this feedback and don't expect any amicable response from them.
As of now.. pilgrims all products are... Amazing... Instant result.. yet I m giving 4 star because...Just applied that mask once... Thanku pilgrim for making beautiful yet effective products...â™¥ï¸

Ever since the use of this shampoo, my hair fall has increased. At first, I thought that maybe it was because I changed the shampoo. As days went on my hair fall started increasing. Even the number of grey hairs also increased. Now I started doubting my trust in this product.

title: Worst experience with Pilgrim
body:
I had ordered 3 products from Pilgrim on August 14th 2023, I head continuously tracking my order but the third party courier parter called â€œProshipâ€ was not showing any update after august 18th. I had called multiple times to pilgrim customer care number no body gave me a proper update on my product. What is the use of having an customer support email id when these stupid people donâ€™t reply to multiple mails. I even waited like 10 days then they will say wait for 24-48 hrs, it will be delivered, this thing happened like 5 times. And after waiting for 15+ odd days they told me that there will be a refund initiated which I had not asked for. Later after complaining and calling them multiple times and emailing them multiple times after scolding one of the support team guy, he reordered my products for the same price as I was not willing to take my amount back after waiting for 20 days. Later after 24 days of fight I received my pilgrim product. 
I really had the worst experience with this company they are very negligent against the customers. 
Please update the process properly and provide informations correctly on request.
99% Aloe Vera Gel

title: Worst sunscreen ever
body: I've tried a lot of products from pilgrim since the last year. Have to say this spf 30 serum sunscreen was the worst experience ever. I've tried sunscreen from across brands whether pharmacy or the drugstore ones but this one caused burning on the mouth, upper lip and cheeks area like no other. I've tried using it in various ways directly after cleansing, after just a hydrating mist from pilgrim and after a moisturiser NOTHING WORKS. Everytime it was the same burning unbearable so i took it off within 2-3 minutes. One day i left it longer too but it was the same. So concluded it was the product and not something that i was using in a wrong way. Therefore having to throw away the whole new bottle.

1. No matter how hydrated your face is this doesnâ€™t blend because of this dam thick texture.

2. I have used layered up face oil and moisture and then tried to blend, it started forming peeling.

So no matter what mentioned you try this is overall a wast of money and time to try it in new ways this doesnâ€™t make any use to your skin.

title: Does it really hydrate with HA?
body: The face serum is good considering the active ingredients but Hyaluronic acid can dry your skin ( take the moisture or evaporate water out from your skin) in few situations like low humid regions especially if it is low molecular weight. Being a botany post-grad, I would suggest to first educate yourself and then figure out a way to use hyaluronic acid serum. For long-term it's better if you minimise the use of hyaluronic acid. No negative criticism for this particular product but it would have better if the molecular weight for such strong ingredients are mentioned in the product description. As customers we should know what we are using for our skin.
Sulfate Free Shampoo with Argan Oil, Camellia & White Lotus

title: Not for me
body:
I was looking forward to try this shampoo after reading rave reviews but unfortunately I was bitterly disappointed. 
This shampoo left my hair feeling rough with a slight oily film. I also noticed increased hair fall while detangling. 
I tried it again a few days later and even diluted it with water as this shampoo is rather think but alas the same results. 
There's definitely some ingredients in this shampoo doing more damage than good I'm afraid. 
Back to my old sulphate free shampoo...

title: Tea tree Light Non Oily Moisturizer
body: I bought the Tea Tree Light non oily  moisturizer from Pilgrim sale. I was very excited to use it since it had such promising ingredients like centella aka cica , willow bark, hyaluronic acid , glycolic acid, green tea, tea tree etc. But to my surprise when I used over my treatment serums like niacinamide or salicylic acid, it started piling off and fall off my skin. It's better for teens who don't use any serum, good for normal CTMS routine.. For me it didn't work out..

Hiii guys
Do not order anything from the website, I have also applied the B1G1 offer code but only 1 product has been delivered and after talking to the customer care, the statement means that these people are changing the offer condition.

If aap B1G1 offer ke liye apply karoge baad m kuch bhi bahana de or after dilivery condition change ka bahana bana denge

please avoid fraud

title: You need this hair mask for smooth and bouncy hair ??
body: I can finally flaunt my long, frizz-free without any issues! I did not expect it to work this well from the first use itself, but It has given me GREAT RESULTS! I love applying the hair mask after showering, as it makes my hair more manageable and silky. Go for it!

title: There is no doubt that this hair serum is the best for premature aging
body: Due to work stress and college pressure, I started noticing a few white strands in my jet-black hair and I was really worried about that. To fix it, I was searching for something to fix this issue of mine, and I came across Pilgrim's Anti-grey Hair serum for white hair. I love the results. My hair looks healthier now!

title: Worth the investment
body: Pilgrim's Peeling Solution exceeded my expectations. With a thoughtful blend of AHAs, BHAs, and PHAs, it effortlessly revitalizes my skin's texture and radiance. After each use, my complexion feels noticeably smoother and looks more youthful. The formula's mild tingling reassures me it's working without causing discomfort. I appreciate the clear instructions and the fact that it's suitable for my sensitive skin. It's become an integral part of my skincare routine, and the visible results make it a standout product. If you're seeking an effective yet gentle exfoliation solution, Pilgrim's offering is undoubtedly worth the investment.

title: Fastest results ever
body: I didn't believe that I had a solution to my hairloss. But I have been a user of pilgrim face serums for a long time now and after trying minoxidil finasteride and every other possible thing for hairloss. I decided to give this a try and trust me my early age (20 years) male pattern baldness just completely stopped within one week of usage. It's been 25 days now i haven't seen any new significant growth but the main thing is my hair thickness have been so sooo much better. I would recommend to apply on the scalp thoroughly at the night and just wash your hair without shampoo in the morning and you be good to go

title: Effective Product. Affordable price.
body: Writing this review after using the product for more than three months now. So this product is very affordable especially when you get it on sale (and pilgrim have sales almost every week), and it works! yes for the price I got I wasn't expecting my year-old acne scars to fade. I have hypersensitive acne-prone compromised barrier combination skin which makes me reluctant to try any product but this thing helped me regain my confidence in skincare as it faded my scars in just 4 weeks and helped in reducing further breakouts. Even new spots were not as severe as before. Plus this feels hydrating too. It feels light and watery in texture and spreads smoothly and evenly. I layer it with Pilgrim's glow sleeping mask now and it's a must-have for people with combo-sensitive skin. I wish it had 2% alpha arbutin instead but 1% is great for beginners though. And a little goes a long way, I used this serum every day for the first month then used it 3 times a week after that, and still l have some product left! Lastly, the bottle is an amber glass bottle meaning the product stays protected and the packaging is quite attractive if you love aesthetic products.

title: Didn't even receive the product and you are asking  for a review. Seriously?
body:
This is one of the worst experiences I had on online shopping. There was zero customer support on your end and the product hasn't been delivered yet. It's been 2 weeks and you just get messages saying the product is out for delivery
 But no one even makes an attempt to call you or no delivery attempt is made at the address. But in the evening you receive calls and messages saying that the order was refused by the consignee. This happened at least 6 times before I cancelled the order on the website and even after that these pointless messages just keep coming. I even called the customer support thrice regarding this and they were also of zero help. I am just grateful that I it wasn't a prepaid order and the order was placed on COD. Never even attenpting to buy from pilgrim again.

title: They are cheats telling there is a sale
body: I order 8 products and received only 6 of them. I had ordered this lip mask as well. But I didn't receive it. I paid for my order while collecting my parcel. But 2 items were missing. On complaining to the customer care, they said they will contact me back withing two days time. But its been a week already and still no one has called. Don't fall for buy one get one free offer guys. Its a scam! They want you to order more so that you think you will get more products and then they don't deliver the free products and don't even revert back when we complain. It was my first experience with them and it has been the worst. I have been using their products, but I order it from amazon. Atleast they don't cheat like this. And there customer care is too good. They take care of the issue within five minutes. This is horrible!

Dear Sir/ Madam,
I am facing issues of hair fall and grey hair and I have just purchased 2 products for the first time as below - have some queries regarding the same:
1. Redensyl & Anagain Hair Growth Serum - I understand that I should use it at night.
a. Do I have to wash my hair the next morning/ day or can I wash after 3 days? 

2. Patua Anti-Grey Hair Serum 
a. This is to be used in the day time???
b. Do I need to wash my hair the next day or can I wash after 3 days?
c. Is it Ok if both the above products are used together?

I appreciate your help and early response.

title: An honest review
body:
I have been using it past  20 days now and this is my honest review based on these factors - age 27+ , gender - female, problem - little pigmentation on cheek bones, dry cheeks and oily T Zone (during winter), location -kolkata ( reason of giving location - the one reading it can compare the climate of kolkata with their area climate as I feel climate also plays a vital role in skin care products) 
Review time- 
The product is easy to blend , it glides smoothly and get's easily absorbed. I like the mild fragrance it has , gives moisturization upto 4-5 hours post that if u r at home , have to reapply it if u want to. Small quantity goes a log way. 

Taking about glow ,till now no such glow i can evidence on my skin , may be i have to give it more time. 

Fyi- I am using it's serum as well to enhance the effect .
Alpha Arbutin & Vitamin C Brightening Serum
location: Delhi, National Capital Territory of Delhi, India

title: Not for dry Hair ...
body:
My hair is Dry and Frizzy. And I live in a High Humid Weather. Whenever I apply Serum, for sometimes (few hours) my hair smells and  looks good, after that it makes my hair puffy and I Hate that feeling Very much.  And even make my hair tangled.
I have been Very much disappointed my this Serum.  
Probably it will work Normal to Oily hair people. Strictly not for dry hair. Probably the Humidity also plays a role. If u live in a Low Humid Weather, you can give it a dry.
